name: Virtual telescope
description: Get the star sky that is above you and visit other planets in the virtual reality!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8 64-bit Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce™ GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290, equivalent or better Storage: 4500 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8 64-bit Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better Storage: 4500 MB available space Sound Card: Any
